title: "Molecular Nodes"

---

Molecular nodes is a project that I have been working on for the efficient import of structural biology data into the 3D modelling and animation program Blender. 

For more details on the Molecular Nodes project, check out either the [github page](https://github.com/bradyajohnston/molecularnodes) or the [documentation](https://bradyajohnston.github.io/molecularnodes).
